  35.  def timeout(timeout: FiniteDuration): WorkflowDef[S]

    Define a timeout for the duration of the entire workflow.

    Define a timeout for the duration of the entire workflow. When the timeout expires, the workflow is finished and no transitions are allowed.

    timeout

    Timeout duration

  2.  def formatted(fmtstr: String): String
    Implicit

    Definition Classes

    @deprecated @inline()
    Deprecated

    (Since version 2.12.16) Use formatString.format(value) instead of value.formatted(formatString), or use the f"" string interpolator. In Java 15 and later, formatted resolves to the new method in String which has reversed parameters.
